about_the_game:
Hughes is a polar explorer. He finds himself in a snowy mountain area and tries to figure out what's going on. Hughes finds an old radio at the beginning of his adventure. Strange voice from this radio begins to guide Hughes. Is it worth listening to this voice? And where will it all lead?

Hughes lost the pages of his diary somewhere here. He needs not only to find them, but also to fight their guards - the embodiment of his fears.

Features:
  • Explore a big seamless world with multiple locations (only 3 / 6 chapters in demo)
  • Collect equipment and discover many secret passages
  • Fight interesting unique bosses (there are 3 / 9 guards in demo)
  • Unique game progression system - unlock checkpoints and replay them to achieve your goals
  • Choose your difficulty mode - 5 options from beginner to professional of platformer games
  • Try additional unlockable challenges (not available in demo)
  • Immerse yourself in the scary two-tone snow world
  • Try smart anti-aliasing mode if you don't like pixelart

short_description: This is a minimalistic horror platformer about survival adventures at snowy mountains. Follow the mysterious voice from the radio, fight your fears and reveal the truth!
